message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper focuses on developing a fully automatic compositing system using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) to predict the potential location and size of person segments given a background image. This involves image processing, computer vision, and machine learning techniques, which are all relevant to the computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper deals with the retrieval of context-based segments using pre-trained deep feature representations, which falls under the graphics (cs.GR) and multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories. Finally, the paper also involves user studies and interface design, which are related to the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
